Reviews.Title: do not buy! customer support are non-existence
Reviews.Author: thymike
Reviews.Content: Bought this system & installed, the DVR only record on 1 channel with motion detected, if you want to record all 4 channels, you have to manually set it, the software came with it was a joke! forget about watching over the internet on IE. Called customer service @ Vonnic 3 times and the machine answered I left 3 messages but I never get get reply and also with an email. Now I have to uninstall everything put it back in the box and return it. don't waste your time.

Reviews.Title: best consumer service ever
Reviews.Author: jjimmi
Reviews.Content: Had my Vonnic security system go out after a storm, must of been a power surge. Anyway called Vonnic and a actual person answered on the second ring. Told me to send it in and it would be repaired or replaced. Three days later got a brand new later model replacement at my door. I am impressed! They answer the phone, they stand behind their products, are prompt and treat customers great. My hat off to the folks at VONNIC!
